casebody.data:
Christopher Lee PRICE, petitioner,
v.
Jefferson S. DUNN, Commissioner, Alabama Department of Corrections, et al. No. 18-8766 (18A1044). Supreme Court of the United States April 12, 2019.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Justice GINSBURG, Justice BREYER, Justice SOTOMAYOR, and Justice KAGAN would grant the application for stay of execution.
